geo.address: 江苏 常州（金坛/溧阳）

summary.zh: 古太湖分化残留湖泊，位于常州金坛与溧阳交界，是区域重要淡水水体。
summary.en: A remnant lake of the ancient Taihu system at the Jintan–Liyang boundary of Changzhou; a key freshwater body in the region.

background.zh: 长荡湖又名洮湖、长塘湖，湖水主要来自茅山并向东入滆湖。近年推进生态治理与休闲文旅建设。
background.en: Also known as Taohu/Changtang Lake, it receives inflow from Maoshan and drains east to Gehu Lake; recent years saw ecological restoration and leisure-tourism development.

geo.address: 江苏 常州市金坛区 长荡湖旅游度假区

summary.zh: 以餐饮船与江南水乡建筑群闻名的湖上水街，夜景氛围感十足。
summary.en: A lakeside water-street of restaurant boats and Jiangnan-style architecture, renowned for its night scenery.

background.zh: 景区以千米级水街与餐船体验吸引游客，配套栈桥与灯光工程，形成“湖八鲜”美食与夜游动线。
background.en: The kilometer-scale water street and boat dining define the experience, with piers and lighting, featuring the 'Eight Lake Delicacies' night-tour route.

name.zh: 溧阳长荡湖国家湿地公园
name.en: Liyang Changdang Lake National Wetland Park

pinyin: Lìyáng Chángdàng Hú Guójiā Shīdì Gōngyuán

geo.address: 江苏 常州市 溧阳市（长荡湖片区）

summary.zh: 典型的“过水性、浅水草型”湖泊湿地，兼具休闲观光与科普教育。
summary.en: A typical 'through-flowing, shallow macrophyte' lake wetland for leisure and interpretation.

background.zh: 湿地公园面向公众开放，重点打造水上美食、互动娱乐与生态科普板块，形成湖区轻度度假体验。
background.en: Open to the public with focuses on water cuisine, interactive activities and eco-interpretation, shaping a light holiday experience around the lake.

sources.title: 携程：溧阳长荡湖国家湿地公园

geo.address: 江苏 常州市 金坛区 儒林镇 柚山村

summary.zh: 七夕前后在湖畔举行的放灯节，是传承两百年的水乡民俗。
summary.en: A Qixi-season floating-lantern ritual on the lakeshore, a two-century-old waterside folk custom.

background.zh: 2022 年活动在柚山村举办；当地通过生态修复，宕口遗址公园因湖面形似“翡翠之心”走红。放灯节为江苏省级非遗项目，常设民俗展演与夜游活动。
background.en: The 2022 edition took place in Youshan Village. Ecological restoration turned a quarry pit into the 'Emerald Heart' park. The festival is a Jiangsu provincial ICH item with folk performances and night tours.
